QuestData.Title: Fragments of Memory
QuestData.Description: <The beautiful elven burial urn is shattered carelessly on the ground. It was clearly handled roughly, but not scratched by the talons of the harpies.>$b$b<You find a trail of shards leading towards a cave. Those responsible are certainly within. Thaedris would be interested in the relics and their safe return.>
QuestData.RewardText: These relics are tokens and mementos of the former lives of those interred here. They like to be remembered and these offerings keep them in their eternal peace.$b$bThe spirits of the fallen will be at rest now. You have my gratitude.
